name: claim_airdrop
attributes: # [doc = " 保有中の NFT 枚数に応じたエアドロップを請求し、"]
# [doc = " ユーザーごとの累積を更新します。"]
# [doc = " 署名チェックを user: AccountInfo のまま省略しています。"]
body: let count = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . airdrop_data ;
data . total_airdropped = data . total_airdropped . checked_add (to_drop) . unwrap () ;
data . last_claim_time = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " トランザクション手数料支払い用（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エアドロップ請求ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保有枚数を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: airdrop_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エアドロップ累積データを保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , space = 8 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"airdrop" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
